text: 8:44 Matyu 13:38; 1 Jon 3:8; Jut 1:6Ia uan afeziam Satanɨn boriba. Egha ia uan afeziamɨn ifongiamɨn gɨn mangasa bar gavgafi. A fomɨra ikia gumazamizibav sozima me ariaghiri. Ezɨ guizbangɨn arazim an itir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a guizbangɨn arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. An akar ifavaribagh ami, kar an akamra. An akar ifavaribagh amir gumazim, egha guizbangɨra akar ifavaribar afeziam.
